name: Yellow flowers
description: Flowers I made inspired by Tyler Hobbs artwork. The main idea was to create some artwork containing flowers and I took Tylers work named Petal loops as an inspiration. I used an example code we did together with Bassima and Garrit during a workshop on the 28/8 as help and a structure to continue build my own code on.

name: Different colored flowers
description: A variation of the first flowers I made inspired by Tyler Hobbs artwork. The chnages I made to variate it was to give the flowers different some different shades of pink in a randomized patter! Same thing here with coding structure, I used an example code we did together with Bassima and Garrit during a workshop on the 28/8 as help and a structure to continue build my own code on, and added some more lines and changes in this second version.
Week one, artwork number 2 and variation 1! A variation of Vera Molnar square-art :D
Week one, artwork number 2 and variation 2! A second variation of Molnars art with squares

name: Fading shapes with sparkles
description: I took some inspiration from Molnars work, and made some changes of my own liking to it. I started with making she squares solid colors and then adding some randomized squares to it to switch things up a litle. I used some of the examples from the lectures, such as the example for Molnars squares and also the particle example which I then added into the molnar-code, and in this second version I added a fading effect with each mouse-click.
